title: The Republic of Tea – Limited-Edition Fall Apple Teas - Hot Apple Cider and Caramel Apple Herbal Tea Bundle – 36 Count Tea Bags Each
descriptions:
Introducing The Republic of Tea – Limited-Edition Fall Apple Teas - Hot Apple Cider and Caramel Apple Herbal Tea Bundle! This delightful bundle includes 36 count tea bags of both Hot Apple Cider Herbal Tea and Caramel Apple Herbal Tea.

The Hot Apple Cider Herbal Tea is a naturally-caffeine free blend that perfectly captures the flavors of apple cider, cinnamon, and cloves. It is made with a blend of apple pieces, cinnamon, orange peel, rose hips, berry leaves, natural flavors, ginger root, cloves, citric acid, and cardamom seeds. With its comforting and aromatic taste, this tea is perfect for cozy autumn evenings.

The Caramel Apple Herbal Tea is also caffeine-free and features the delectable combination of sweet apples, vanilla, and a base of South African Rooibos. Its ingredients include Rooibos, apple bits, natural apple and caramel flavors, and vanilla extract. This tea offers a luscious and indulgent flavor profile that will satisfy any sweet tooth.

To prepare these teas, simply bring water to a rolling boil and steep the tea bags for 5-7 minutes in 6 oz of water. For an added eco-friendly touch, you can compost or add the used tea bags to soil.

This Limited-Edition Fall Apple Teas bundle is ideal for those looking to embrace the harvest season and enjoy a delightful dessert tea. Don't miss out on this special blend that perfectly captures the essence of fall.
